dict.string: /usr/bin/sqlite3 \ "${HOME}/Library/Application Support/Alfred/Databases/clipboard.alfdb" \ ".parameter set :img_dir '~/Library/Application Support/Alfred/Databases/clipboard.alfdb.data/'" \ "SELECT JSON_OBJECT('items', JSON_GROUP_ARRAY(JSON_OBJECT( -- 978307200 is timeIntervalSinceReferenceDate in Unix time 'title', strftime('%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S', datetime(ts + 978307200, 'unixepoch')), 'subtitle', app, 'arg', :img_dir || datahash, 'match', app, 'type', 'file:skipcheck', 'icon', JSON_OBJECT('path', :img_dir || datahash)))) AS JSON_RESULT FROM ( SELECT ts, app, datahash FROM clipboard WHERE dataType IS 1 ORDER BY ts DESC)"
↩ Take and upload interactive screenshot · ⌥↩ View uploaded images
Get one and configure it in the workflow. https://api.imgur.com/oauth2/addclient
No API Client ID Key Set

## Usage
### Files
Search screenshots via the `screenshots` keyword.
![Starting screenshots search](images/about/filekeyword.png)
![Showing file screenshots grid](images/about/filegrid.png)
* <kbd>↩</kbd> View in Alfred. * <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Copy to clipboard. * <kbd>⌥</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Reveal in Finder. * <kbd>⌃</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Rerun search with Optical Character Recognition on images. * <kbd>⇧</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Upload to [Imgur](https://imgur.com).
![Showing single image](images/about/imagepreview.png)
* <kbd>↩</kbd> Show compatible apps for opening. * <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Copy to clipboard. * <kbd>⌥</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Reveal in Finder. * <kbd>⇧</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Upload to [Imgur](https://imgur.com). * <kbd>⎋</kbd> Return to Grid View.
### Clipboard
View clipboard images via the `clipimg` keyword. The same actions as searching files apply.
![Keyword to view clipboard images](images/about/clipkeyword.png)
![Showing clipboard screenshots grid](images/about/clipgrid.png)
### Web
Take an interactive screenshot and upload it to Imgur via the `imgur` keyword. This requires [getting an API client ID](https://api.imgur.com/oauth2/addclient) and adding it in the [Workflow’s Configuration](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/workflows/user-configuration/).
![Take screenshot to imgur](images/about/imgurkeyword.png)
Alternatively, upload any image with the [Universal Action](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/features/universal-actions/).
![Upload to Imgur with Universal Action](images/about/imgurua.png)
View uploaded images with <kbd>⌥</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> in the `imgur` keyword.
![Viewing uploaded images](images/about/imguruploaded.png)
* <kbd>↩</kbd> View in Alfred. * <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Delete from Imgur. * <kbd>⌥</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Copy image URL.
Keyword and folder to search screenshots.
Keyword for previewing Clipboard History screenshots.
Keyword and options for uploading to imgur.
